malika malkumari nishapadanaya karana dewani wedikawa sangitha adhyakshanaya wisharada rohana dharmakirthigeni.me muhurath ulela ha eeta sahabhagi wu kalakaruwan pirisage ruwa kamara asata hamu wu mohothak.doshan balage nishpadanaya karana anuruddha gambhiraaarachchi wisin adhyakshanaya karanu labana ‘pathum mal wasanthaya’ dirgha teli natyaye muhurath ulela pasugiyada boralla shri rahula natya pasaledi pawathwiya.sunanda silwage katha sankalpayata nirmanaya wana mehi bandula withanage, awanthi aponsu, thilak kumara rathnayaka, manisha namalgama, manjula moragaha, kumara jayakantha, sarath dikkumbaura, githa kanthi jayakodi, madhu nithyani, dayasiri hettiaarachchi, somawira gamage, kapila sigera, ruchi disanayaka, kumara ranepura, je. em. si. jayasekara, nadunmali shakya, radhika sewwandi, indunil malwaththa, deshan pathum balage, gishan lahiru, nalin premajiwa, prasad karunarathna, indra pathmini, nilu koralage athulu pirisa ranganaye yedeyi.thushara ranasinhage kamara adhyakshanayaki.
